text:
Dear Anton,

Thank you for your reply. I already tried the replace function but it will not change the image in the email automatically the old image still exists in the email. I will check this HubSpot support.

Number 2 is also ideal indeed, and as you mentioned I will ignore number 3 and 4.

Thank you for your support.

hi everyone,

what is the best way to embedd an excel file on a webpage so that you see the full sheet. So changing the iframe
quick update, there is known bug in HubSpot for the replace image function but beside of that it is working properly :slightly_smiling_face: thanks again for your support
